channel.title: Gab's Blog
channel.description: Thoughts on building websites with AI, static hosting, and running a business without paying for developers.

item.title: Automate Google Flow Visuals with Claude — Complete the Pipeline
item.description: Part IV: The last manual step dies. Use Claude to drive Google Flow, generate music video visuals, and close the full automation loop.

item.title: Automate Suno Music Creation with Claude's Browser Extension
item.description: Part III: Let Claude drive Suno for you. Automate prompt writing, track generation, and downloads using the Claude browser extension.

item.title: Automate Your Faceless Channel — How to Auto-Upload to YouTube with Python
item.description: Part II: Automate YouTube uploads for your faceless channel. A Python script that handles titles, descriptions, tags, and scheduling.

item.title: How to Create an Album and a Faceless Channel with Suno, Google Flow and DistroKid
item.description: Create a full album with AI-generated music, build a faceless YouTube channel, and distribute to every streaming platform. No studio required.

item.title: Claude Code vs Hiring a Web Developer — Real Cost Breakdown
item.description: A side-by-side comparison of building a business website with Claude Code vs hiring a freelance developer. Real numbers, real trade-offs.

item.title: 5 Websites You Can Build for Free This Weekend
item.description: Five real website ideas you can build and launch this weekend using Claude Code and GitHub Pages. Free hosting, no coding, live by Sunday.

item.title: Why I Stopped Using WordPress for My Hotel Websites
item.description: I run a 60+ room hotel in Quebec. For years I paid developers and dealt with WordPress headaches. Then I found a better way that costs $0/month.

item.title: What Is GitHub Pages? A Non-Technical Explanation
item.description: GitHub Pages explained in plain English. How it works, why it's free, what it can and can't do, and why more people should be using it.
